explains: adj. 绝对的（名词categoricalness，副词categorically，异体字categoric）；直截了当的；无条件的；属于某一范畴的
wordGroup: categorical data [计]分类数据；[经]分类资料

sentences.en: In category theory he developed categorical logic.
sentences.cn: 在范畴理论中，他发展了范畴逻辑。

sentences.en: I am sure that if you approach the topic from categorical point of view.
sentences.cn: 我相信如果你从范畴论的观点来看的话一切看起来都是很基本的。

sentences.en: The documents refer to a "defensive strategy" based on "categorical denial".
sentences.cn: 文件将这一回避性的否认称之为‘防卫策略’。
